text: The following is the qualification system and qualified countries for the Roller sports at the 2019 Pan American Games competition held in Lima, Peru. ==Qualification== A total of 56 roller sports athletes will qualify to compete. 16 will qualify in artistic and 40 in speed skating. The Pan American Championships for each discipline held in 2018 was used to determine the qualifiers. ==Qualification timeline== {|class="wikitable" width=750 |- ! Events !! Date !!
